TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ExportDefinition extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Describes the contract that a particular object satisfies.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Derived types that call this constructor must override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition.ContractName%2A> property and optionally, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition.Metadata%2A> property. By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition.Metadata%2A> returns an empty, read-only dictionary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string contractName, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> metadata) cil managed

Docs.param: The contract name of the object.

The metadata of the or to set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition.Metadata%2A> property to an empty, read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified contract name and metadata.

Docs.value: The contract name of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Overrides of this property should never return `null` or an empty string ("").

Docs.exception: The property was not overridden by a derived class.

Docs.value: The metadata of the . The default is an empty, read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Overrides of this property should return a read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object with a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparer, such as <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>, and should never return `null`.
If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition> does not contain metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> instead.

Docs.summary: Returns a string representation of the export definition.
